judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.

casebody.head_matter:
Neyman, Appellant, v. Soutter.
Argued March 22, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Robert Palkovitz, with him David S. Palkovitz, Jack Palkovitz, and Palkovitz and Palkovitz, for appellant.
Ines W. Cordisco, for appellee.
May 3,1965:
